issue.title: [CI] Limit clcache cache size
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3167](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3167). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The clcache cache on AppVeyor has a default max size of 1 GB and can reach close to this size (see e.g. https://ci.appveyor.com/project/ApacheSoftwareFoundation/arrow/build/1.0.7722/job/5gp85w0m5xei0nme#L251). We should limit its size to something more reasonable to lower cache transfer / compression times.
